mechanics.outcome: Regain hit points equal to 1d10 + your fighter level

mechanics.condition: Has not finished a short or long rest

description_text: You have a limited well of stamina that you can draw on to protect yourself from harm. On your turn, you can use a bonus action to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + your fighter level. Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.
